pages.text:
Inside Play, located in the heart of Pensacola’s entertainment district Downtown, you can take a journey to the past. The space is filled to the brim with vintage arcade games dating back as far as 1972 and into the 80’s, 90’s and beyond.
If you listen closely you’ll hear as an undertone to the some of the area’s best djs the distinct recognizable sound effects from your favorite games and bustling crowd energy.
But Play isn’t just for any “geek off the street.” It’s always a party with great cocktails and a nice beer selection. The appeal to participate is universal and quite perfect - Booze, great people and fun games are a combination for an awesome adventure.

Location
16 S. Palafox Place, 2nd Floor
Pensacola, FL 32502
Hours
Tuesday — Friday
7:00pm — 2:00am
Saturday — Sunday
4pm — 2:00am
Contact
@playpensacola
(850) 466-
2095
PLAY features more than 25 VINTAGE arcade games from the ‘80s and ‘90s, POP-A-SHOT BASKETBALL, four classic skeeball alleys, BUBBLE HOCKEY, AIR HOCKEY, PUNCHING BAG GAME AND MORE.
RENT PLAY
Did you know you or your organization can rent Play? The space is perfect for all occasions - from office parties to team building and from birthday’s to everything in between.
LEARN MORE
HERE
